data.why:
I have written a module that manipulates data that consists of
    columns and rows: -Column and row separators can be defined for
    import and export -Columns and rows can be selected, appended,
    combined, rotated etc. -Columns and rows can be converted to arrays
    or hashes (and vice versa) -Columns and rows (with arbitrary
    separators) can be loaded and saved to disk.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (MAUSER; Martin Frank  Hohmann-Marriott)
